name: Alchemy Cubes
description:
Alchemy Cubes

Alchemy cube is a puzzle game about trying to escape from a dungeon. You are trapped in the depth of the dungeon, the only thing can help you to get out is the knowledge of elements. Use and mix the cubes filled with elements to solve the puzzles and find a way out, nothing can block an Alchemist!

Control

  • Arrow to move
  • Z to push or pull the cubes.

Credits

  • BGM from: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Visager/Songs_From_An_Unmade_World_2/
